banner.title: Gastric Bypass is an effective solution
banner.content: This surgery limits the amount of food that can be eaten and reduces the absorption of nutrients, which can help people with obesity lose weight and improve their overall health.

before-and-after.title: This is what your
before-and-after.titleSpan: surgery will look like with us

step-by-step.title: Some characteristics of the
step-by-step.titleSpan: Gastric Bypass that you should know about

process1.content: Reduce the amount of food that can be consumed at each meal.

process2.content: It promotes weight loss that can be significant and sustained over the long term.

process3.content: It requires lifestyle changes, such as adopting a healthy diet and exercising regularly.

process4.content: It can improve obesity-related health conditions such as type 2 diabetes, high blood pressure and sleep apnea.

process5.content: It requires prior evaluation to determine if they are suitable candidates and to understand the risks and benefits of surgery.

banner.title: Control your diet and
banner.content: Gastric Sleeve is a surgery that will help you with weight loss, should be performed by a qualified and experienced bariatric surgeon, and should be considered as a last resort after other weight loss options have been tried without success.

before-and-after.title: This is what your
before-and-after.titleSpan: surgery will look like with us

process1.content: It is important to follow the diet prescribed by the doctor or nutritionist for optimal recovery.

process2.content: It is essential to stay hydrated by drinking enough water and other sugar-free liquids.

process3.content: You will need to attend follow-up appointments with your surgeon and health care team to monitor your progress.

process4.content: Avoid heavy lifting and straining for several weeks after surgery.

process5.content: You are likely to experience pain after surgery, so you will need to take painkillers as prescribed by your doctor.

banner.title: Revision surgery is a second chance to
banner.content: This surgery is performed on people who have not achieved the desired results with their initial bariatric surgery, or who have developed complications such as blockages, acid reflux or insufficient weight loss.

banner.title: Metabolic surgery can help you
banner.titleSpan: transform your health and your life.
banner.content: Metabolic surgery can be achieved through various procedures, such as gastric bypass, gastric sleeve, intragastric balloon and others, its goal is to help people with obesity to lose weight and improve their health.

before-and-after.title: This is what your
before-and-after.titleSpan: surgery will look like with us

step-by-step.title: Some of the advantages of having

process1.content: It can help you lose a significant amount of weight in the long term.

process2.content: It can improve or even cure health problems related to obesity, hypertension, sleep apnea and non-alcoholic fatty liver disease.

process3.content: Improves quality of life by reducing the symptoms of obesity.

process4.content: It helps motivate people to adopt a healthier lifestyle.

process5.content: We have specialists ready to help you achieve your goals.

banner.title: At MEDTRIP we give you
banner.content: This oral treatment goes beyond an aesthetic change, we seek to harmonize your face, improve the bite and dental reconstruction, with a new and natural smile.

before-and-after.title: Increase your self-esteem and confidence with
before-and-after.titleSpan: your smile that will open up unlimited possibilities.

process1.content: Change the overall appearance: Smile design is one way to improve a person's facial appearance. You can give your smile a more attractive and natural look.

process2.content: Increases confidence: A more harmonious smile increases self-confidence. This can help you to be a more open and self-confident person.

process3.content: Reduces stress: Having a nice smile will help improve mental health by minimizing stress.

process4.content: Improved oral health: Oral health will be improved with smile design. This includes better alignment of teeth, reduced gum exposure and improved dental hygiene.

process5.content: Improves general health: Oral health and general health are closely related. A more attractive smile can help improve overall health.

banner.title: Thanks to MEDTRIP you will have a
banner.content: We can safely remove stains and discoloration from your teeth to improve their appearance and your confidence.

before-and-after.title: A bright set of teeth that brightens your
before-and-after.titleSpan: face and gives you reason to smile.

process1.content: Prevents diseases: After the application of our whitening protocols, the development of cavities and other oral diseases is prevented since the bacteria that cause these pathologies cannot easily adhere to the teeth.

process2.content: Improves the appearance of teeth: In addition to removing stains, this treatment will give your teeth more shine and a healthier appearance.

process3.content: Increases your confidence: Having a more aesthetic and healthy smile will improve the appearance of your face and as a consequence your self-esteem will be reinforced.

process4.content: Having a nice and rejuvenated smile will help you project the image you want in a confident and trustworthy way.
